traits.name: Goal-Oriented
traits.description: Drives achievement of public policy objectives.
traits.action: Set and track community project milestones using SMM’s progress tracker.

traits.name: Strength
traits.description: Enhances mental resilience for high-pressure governance roles.
traits.action: Lead a challenging public initiative to demonstrate fortitude.

traits.name: Accurate
traits.description: Ensures precision in policy documentation and reporting.
traits.action: Deliver a flawless policy report to highlight accuracy.

traits.name: Logical Reasoning
traits.description: Aids in analyzing complex policy issues.
traits.action: Apply logic in a policy analysis to showcase expertise.

traits.name: Spatially Aware
traits.description: Helps visualize urban or logistical planning.
traits.action: Create a city planning map to display spatial skills.

traits.name: Dexterity
traits.description: Improves efficiency in fieldwork or administrative tasks.
traits.action: Demonstrate precise task execution in a public service simulation.

traits.name: Athletic
traits.description: Boosts stamina for fieldwork or law enforcement roles.
traits.action: Maintain a fitness routine to sustain energy in public duties.

traits.name: Melodic
traits.action: Use vocal clarity in a public address to captivate audiences.

traits.name: Artistic Sensitivity
traits.action: Design compelling policy infographics to showcase aesthetics.

traits.name: Creativity
traits.action: Propose a novel community program in a meeting.

traits.name: Observational
traits.description: Captures community needs or policy gaps.
traits.action: Share observational insights in a policy discussion.

traits.name: Problem-Solving
traits.action: Lead a solution for a community issue to showcase skills.

traits.name: Decision-Making
traits.action: Make strategic decisions in a governance simulation.

traits.name: Critical Thinking

traits.name: Communication
traits.action: Deliver a compelling public speech to showcase communication.

traits.name: Leadership

traits.name: Negotiation
traits.action: Negotiate a mock resource allocation to highlight skills.

traits.name: Drive

traits.action: Share insights from a governance course in a meeting.

traits.name: Resilience
traits.action: Share strategies for overcoming policy setbacks.
